title: Associate Research Consultant
subtitle: GBA Economic Consulting
para: Led quantitative research for 15+ high-impact consulting projects across energy, telecom, transportation, intellectual property, and antitrust. Delivered presentations in English and Spanish to diverse stakeholders including C-level executives. Enabled clients to save over $10M through advanced data-driven strategy insights.

title: Research & Data Analyst
subtitle: Ministry of Education, Government of Chile
para: Directed a data science team in developing a student dropout prediction model using unstructured, high-volume datasets from multiple government agencies. Boosted prediction accuracy from 50% to 80%, directly shaping national policy responses during the COVID-19 pandemic.

title: Research Intern
subtitle: Ministry of Labor, Government of Chile
para: Enhanced national unemployment insurance simulations by upgrading labor market models and cash flow tracking for retirement benefits. Used econometric and statistical modeling techniques on large-scale administrative datasets, coordinating batched jobs on an in-house GPU server.
